contents:
找了下原文
A scary situation for sure, but this does NOT prove the Novel-Coronavirus, (COVID-19) from Wuhan City China, killed Lola. There’s no mention of what kind of coronavirus it was. It could have possibly been a less-severe form of the virus.
Health officials say, don't panic.

"There are no confirmed cases of novel-coronavirus in Mesa County, or in the state of Colorado,” said Spokesperson for Mesa County Public Health, Amanda Mayle.


冠状病毒有很多种 不一定是中国爆发的这种
以及所在州也没有病例 （不过医院也没测 所以不能确定）
